name: Direct Current
description:
In the far future, the peace between robots and humanity is under threat by the chaotic DVORAK and his mechanical legion. It's up to you, QWERTY, to reach end of the final line and put an end to DVORAK once and for all.

Controls On-Track Mode Switch TrackW & S

Hook up to the end of other trains cars to enter...

On-Train Mode MoveWASDShootLeft ClickInteractE

Use Medkits to heal yourself and your train car. However, this takes time, so make sure to keep an eye on the timer!

Credits

Robert (armedturret) - Programming

Julian (Sockman) - Programming & Music

Will (Pretzol) - Sprites & SFX
